mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, notice, memberNum, name, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES(notice_seq.nextval, #{notice}, #{memberNum}, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM notice n JOIN member m ON n.memberNum = m.memberNum
